description: The type and options related to the groups to run workloads as.

ranges.description: List of the allowed GIDs that may be used. If you would like to force a single GID then supply a single range with the same `start` and `end`. This is required when `rule` is set to '`MustRunAs`'.

rule.description: The strategy that will dictate the allowable runAsGroup values that may be set.
